tuv.seg: Life Event Document Caring for a child with a disability There is a range of supports and services available to parents and carers of children with disabilities
Life Event Document Ag tabhairt aire do leanbh atá faoi mhíchumas Tá réimse tacaíochtaí agus seirbhísí ar fáil do thuismitheoirí agus do chúramóirí le haghaidh leanaí faoi mhíchumas
This document provides a broad overview of the services, covering legal matters, health, taxation, etc
Soláthraíonn an cháipéis seo forbhreathnú leathan ar na seirbhísí, lena n-áirítear ábhair dhlíthiúla, sláinte, cáin srl
The general entitlement of children to health services in Ireland and the specific services available
Mínitear sa cháipéis seo faoi na seirbhísí sláinte ginearálta agus sonracha a bhfuil páistí ina dteideal
Immunisations for children and young people
Tá seirbhísí vacsaínithe agus imdhíonta ar fáil saor in aisce do pháistí agus do dhaoine óga
Vaccination and immunisation services are free of charge to children and young people
Tá seirbhísí vacsaínithe/imdhíonta ar fáil do pháistí agus do dhaoine óga
Health services for pre-school children
Seirbhísí sláinte do leanaí réamhscoile
The HSE provides free health screening for pre-school children
Faisnéis maidir leis an tseirbhís seo
GP visit cards for children under 6
Cártaí cuairte LG do leanaí faoi 6 bliana d’aois
Children under 6 are entitled to free visits to participating GPs
Children under 6 are entitled to free visits to participating GPs
Find out how to register for the GP visit card for children under 6
Find out how to register for the GP visit card for children under 6
This document is in: Health > Medical cards and GP visit cards
This document is in: Sláinte > Cártaí leighis agus cártaí cuairte LG
There are various child health screenings provided in public primary schools
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na scagthástála sláinte áirithe atá curtha ar fáil do pháistí atá ag freastal ar bhunscoileanna poiblí
Information on screenings and how they are organised
Faisnéis faoi scagthástála agus conas atá siad eagraithe
